title: How to Kill Your Husband {and Other Handy Household Hints}
description: All wives sporadically want to kill their husbands. 'Where there's a will, I intend to be in it' wives half joke with each other. But when Jazz Jardine is arrested for her husband's murder, the joke falls flat. Life should begin at 40, not life imprisonment for killing your hubby.
author: Kathy Lette
